item.title: Robin add a quote by Ayn Rand
Robin add a quote by Richard Carlson
item.description: "Learning to stop sweating the small stuff involves deciding what things to engage in and what things to ignore. From a certain perspective, life can be described as a series of mistakes, one right after another with a little space in between." -- Richard Carlson

item.title: Robin add a quote by Sue Monk Kidd
item.description: "Someone who thinks death is the scariest thing doesn't know a thing about life." -- Sue Monk Kidd

item.title: Robin add a quote by Sue Monk Kidd
item.description: "some things don't matter much. Like the color of a house. How big is that in the overall scheme of life? But lifting a person's heart--now, that matters. The whole problem with people is...they know what matters, but they don't choose it...The hardest thing on earth is choosing what matters." -- Sue Monk Kidd

item.title: Robin add a quote by Sue Monk Kidd
item.description: "Knowing can be a curse on a person's life. I'd traded in a pack of lies for a pack of truth, and I didn't know which one was heavier. Which one took the most strength to carry around? It was a ridiculous question, though, because once you know the truth, you can't ever go back and pick up your suitcase of lies. Heavier or not, the truth is yours now." -- Sue Monk Kidd

item.title: Robin add a quote by Sue Monk Kidd
item.description: "If you need something from somebody always give that person a way to hand it to you." -- Sue Monk Kidd

item.title: Robin add a quote by Byron Katie
item.description: "As long as you think that the cause of your problem is “out there”—as long as you think that anyone or anything is responsible for your suffering—the situation is hopeless. It means that you are forever in the role of victim, that you’re suffering in paradise." -- Byron Katie

item.title: Robin add a quote by Byron Katie
item.description: "Don't believe every thing you think." -- Byron Katie

item.title: Robin add a quote by Byron Katie
item.description: "I love what I think, and I'm never tempted to believe it." -- Byron Katie

item.title: Robin add a quote by Byron Katie
item.description: "You move totally away from reality when you believe that there is a legitimate reason to suffer"." -- Byron Katie

item.title: Robin add a quote by Samuel Beckett
item.description: "I can't go on, I'll go on." -- Samuel Beckett
